workflow.meta: Workflow to be used in HUB Service flow with JIRA Service Desk

function.arg:
import com.atlassian.crowd.embedded.api.User import com.atlassian.jira.user.util.UserManager import com.atlassian.jira.util.ImportUtils import com.atlassian.jira.ComponentManager import com.atlassian.jira.component.ComponentAccessor import com.atlassian.jira.issue.label.LabelManager
ComponentManager componentManager = ComponentManager.getInstance() com.atlassian.crowd.embedded.api.User currentUser = ComponentManager.instance.jiraAuthenticationContext.getLoggedInUser() def userUtil = componentManager.getUserUtil() LabelManager labelManager = ComponentAccessor.getComponent(LabelManager)
(!userUtil.getGroupNamesForUser(issue.reporter.name).contains("HS-customers") && issue.getProjectObject().key == 'HS') || (labelManager.getLabels(issue.id).collect{it.getLabel()}.contains('InternalHS') && issue.getProjectObject().key == 'HS')

action.name: Resolve
action.meta: This transition state the issue is moving to a field test to verify it's resolution

action.name: TransferToReporter
action.meta: Action used to respond to customer

action.name: TransferToSupport
action.meta: The opened issue should be assigned to a technician and checked

action.name: TransferToEngineering
action.meta: this issue need an Engineering Review

action.name: TransferToOperations
action.meta: Move the issue on Purchasing, Backoffice or in Production

action.name: Expiration
action.meta: too much time is passed without any answer

action.name: TimeRearm
action.meta: Loop Transition fro sending warning emails

action.name: Close
action.meta: This action closes the ticket assuming that the issue is validated from the field

action.name: ReOpen
action.meta: This issue needs to go back to the technical assistance
